column4: ok i got a slight problem. my taskbars are visible they havent dissapeared but the thing is everytime i decide to minimize a window it disapears. when it should normally be on one of my taskbars. only way i have been able to get back to my windows is by alt+tab. does anyone know how to get things back to normal???
